div.p: Judge Barnity has not returned and I cannot leave untill he does I expect him every day as he wrote that he would be home by the 14 and we have not heard since as soon as he comes I expect to leave and be in St Louis by Saturday next and in Boonville on tuesday the 24th but cannot be positive as untill he comes I cannot leave the past month has passed heavily as there has been no business doing and I have been reading novels untill I am tired of that and cannot read any thing of importance in the office The weather here is springlike and courtsquare getting lovely the trees are all out and leaves half grow snowballs in bloom and today the sun rather hot for comfort, I trust I will be with you in a week have not heard from you since your letter of 16 althoa whole month Love and Kisses to all
